name: Xverse
description: Xverse is an all-in-one social metaverse ecosystem, built on the Solana network. Xverse will allow users to interact, play, and earn with other users in a fully customizable metaverse environment. Our first service MyPick will allow users to create and decorate their own social avatars, allow users to buy and sell NFT digital assets , and play various minigames with other users using their avatars. Ro:Mong our second service, will allow users to directly use their avatars within a fully interactive metaverse.
